fullplot: THE FACE OF AN ANGEL tells the story of a journalist and a filmmaker as they lose themselves in a notorious murder case they are covering. Based on true events, a riveting account of the controversial case of a American student accused of murder in Italy.
plot: Both a journalist and a documentary filmmaker chase the story of a murder and its prime suspect.
title: The Face of an Angel

tomatoes.consensus: The Face of an Angel finds director Michael Winterbottom in pursuit of ideas that remain frustratingly diffuse and agonizingly out of his grasp.

writers: Barbie Latza Nadeau (based on the book by)
